cards.title: A Good Leader
cards.description: A person who inspires and motivates others to achieve their goals.

cards.title: Cognitive Level Far Above Peers
cards.description: Possesses exceptional cognitive abilities that stand out among peers.

cards.title: Only Conduct Impactful Research
cards.description: Focuses solely on research that makes a significant difference.

cards.title: Resilience and Tolerance
cards.description: Trains oneself to handle challenges and tolerate frustrations effectively.
